mn29:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati gijjhakūṭe pabbate acirapakkante devadatte.
mn29:1.3_0: Tatra kho bhagavā devadattaṁ ārabbha bhikkhū āmantesi:
mn29:2.1_0: “Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco kulaputto saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito hoti:
mn29:2.2_0: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto,
mn29:2.3_0: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
mn29:2.4_0: So evaṁ pabbajito samāno lābhasakkārasilokaṁ abhinibbatteti.
mn29:2.5_0: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena attamano hoti paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:2.6_0: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena attānukkaṁseti paraṁ vambheti:
mn29:2.7_0: ‘ahamasmi lābhasakkārasilokavā, ime panaññe bhikkhū appaññātā appesakkhā’ti.
mn29:2.8_0: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena majjati pamajjati pamādaṁ āpajjati, pamatto samāno dukkhaṁ viharati.
mn29:2.9_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṁ caramāno mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato atikkammeva sāraṁ atikkamma phegguṁ atikkamma tacaṁ atikkamma papaṭikaṁ, sākhāpalāsaṁ chetvā ādāya pakkameyya ‘sāran’ti maññamāno.
mn29:2.10_0: Tamenaṁ cakkhumā puriso disvā evaṁ vadeyya:
mn29:2.11_0: ‘na vatāyaṁ bhavaṁ puriso aññāsi sāraṁ, na aññāsi phegguṁ, na aññāsi tacaṁ, na aññāsi papaṭikaṁ, na aññāsi sākhāpalāsaṁ.
mn29:2.12_0: Tathā hayaṁ bhavaṁ puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṁ caramāno mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato atikkammeva sāraṁ atikkamma phegguṁ atikkamma tacaṁ atikkamma papaṭikaṁ, sākhāpalāsaṁ chetvā ādāya pakkanto “sāran”ti maññamāno.
mn29:2.13_0: Yañcassa sārena sārakaraṇīyaṁ tañcassa atthaṁ nānubhavissatī’ti.
mn29:2.14_0: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco kulaputto saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito hoti:
mn29:2.15_0: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto,
mn29:2.16_0: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
mn29:2.17_0: So evaṁ pabbajito samāno lābhasakkārasilokaṁ abhinibbatteti.
mn29:2.18_0: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena attamano hoti paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:2.19_0: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti ‘ahamasmi lābhasakkārasilokavā, ime panaññe bhikkhū appaññātā appesakkhā’ti.
mn29:2.20_0: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena majjati pamajjati pamādaṁ āpajjati, pamatto samāno dukkhaṁ viharati.
mn29:2.21_0: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sākhāpalāsaṁ aggahesi brahmacariyassa;
mn29:3.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco kulaputto saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito hoti:
mn29:3.2_0: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto,
mn29:3.3_0: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
mn29:3.4_0: So evaṁ pabbajito samāno lābhasakkārasilokaṁ abhinibbatteti.
mn29:3.5_0: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attamano hoti na paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:3.6_0: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn29:3.7_0: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṁ āpajjati.
mn29:3.9_0: So tāya sīlasampadāya attamano hoti paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:3.10_0: So tāya sīlasampadāya attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti:
mn29:3.11_0: ‘ahamasmi sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo, ime panaññe bhikkhū dussīlā pāpadhammā’ti.
mn29:3.12_0: So tāya sīlasampadāya majjati pamajjati pamādaṁ āpajjati, pamatto samāno dukkhaṁ viharati.
mn29:3.13_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṁ caramāno mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato atikkammeva sāraṁ atikkamma phegguṁ atikkamma tacaṁ, papaṭikaṁ chetvā ādāya pakkameyya ‘sāran’ti maññamāno.
mn29:3.14_0: Tamenaṁ cakkhumā puriso disvā evaṁ vadeyya:
mn29:3.15_0: ‘na vatāyaṁ bhavaṁ puriso aññāsi sāraṁ, na aññāsi phegguṁ, na aññāsi tacaṁ, na aññāsi papaṭikaṁ, na aññāsi sākhāpalāsaṁ.
mn29:3.16_0: Tathā hayaṁ bhavaṁ puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṁ caramāno mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato atikkammeva sāraṁ atikkamma phegguṁ atikkamma tacaṁ, papaṭikaṁ chetvā ādāya pakkanto “sāran”ti maññamāno;
mn29:3.17_0: yañcassa sārena sārakaraṇīyaṁ tañcassa atthaṁ nānubhavissatī’ti.
mn29:4.1_0: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco kulaputto saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito hoti:
mn29:4.2_0: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto,
mn29:4.3_0: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
mn29:4.4_0: So evaṁ pabbajito samāno lābhasakkārasilokaṁ abhinibbatteti.
mn29:4.5_0: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attamano hoti na paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:4.6_0: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn29:4.7_0: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṁ āpajjati.
mn29:4.9_0: So tāya sīlasampadāya attamano hoti paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:4.10_0: So tāya sīlasampadāya attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti:
mn29:4.11_0: ‘ahamasmi sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo, ime panaññe bhikkhū dussīlā pāpadhammā’ti.
mn29:4.12_0: So tāya sīlasampadāya majjati pamajjati pamādaṁ āpajjati, pamatto samāno dukkhaṁ viharati.
mn29:4.13_0: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu papaṭikaṁ aggahesi brahmacariyassa;
mn29:4.15_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco kulaputto saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito hoti:
mn29:4.16_0: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto,
mn29:4.17_0: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
mn29:4.18_0: So evaṁ pabbajito samāno lābhasakkārasilokaṁ abhinibbatteti.
mn29:4.19_0: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attamano hoti na paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:4.20_0: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn29:4.21_0: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṁ āpajjati, appamatto samāno sīlasampadaṁ ārādheti.
mn29:4.22_0: So tāya sīlasampadāya attamano hoti no ca kho paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:4.23_0: So tāya sīlasampadāya na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn29:4.24_0: So tāya sīlasampadāya na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṁ āpajjati.
mn29:4.26_0: So tāya samādhisampadāya attamano hoti paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:4.27_0: So tāya samādhisampadāya attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti:
mn29:4.28_0: ‘ahamasmi samāhito ekaggacitto, ime panaññe bhikkhū asamāhitā vibbhantacittā’ti.
mn29:4.29_0: So tāya samādhisampadāya majjati pamajjati pamādaṁ āpajjati, pamatto samāno dukkhaṁ viharati.
mn29:4.30_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṁ caramāno mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato atikkammeva sāraṁ atikkamma phegguṁ tacaṁ chetvā ādāya pakkameyya ‘sāran’ti maññamāno.

mn29:4.36_0: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.

mn29:4.42_0: So tāya sīlasampadāya na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn29:4.43_0: So tāya sīlasampadāya na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṁ āpajjati, appamatto samāno samādhisampadaṁ ārādheti.
mn29:4.44_0: So tāya samādhisampadāya attamano hoti paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:4.45_0: So tāya samādhisampadāya attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti:
mn29:4.46_0: ‘ahamasmi samāhito ekaggacitto, ime panaññe bhikkhū asamāhitā vibbhantacittā’ti.
mn29:4.47_0: So tāya samādhisampadāya majjati pamajjati pamādaṁ āpajjati, pamatto samāno dukkhaṁ viharati.

mn29:5.13_0: So tāya samādhisampadāya na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn29:5.14_0: So tāya samādhisampadāya na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṁ āpajjati appamatto samāno ñāṇadassanaṁ ārādheti.
mn29:5.15_0: So tena ñāṇadassanena attamano hoti paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:5.16_0: So tena ñāṇadassanena attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti:
mn29:5.18_0: Ime panaññe bhikkhū ajānaṁ apassaṁ viharantī’ti.

mn29:5.27_0: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
mn29:5.28_0: So evaṁ pabbajito samāno lābhasakkārasilokaṁ abhinibbatteti.

mn29:5.30_0: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn29:5.31_0: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṁ āpajjati, appamatto samāno sīlasampadaṁ ārādheti.

mn29:5.33_0: So tāya sīlasampadāya na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn29:5.34_0: So tāya sīlasampadāya na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṁ āpajjati, appamatto samāno samādhisampadaṁ ārādheti.

mn29:6.12_0: So tāya samādhisampadāya na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn29:6.13_0: So tāya samādhisampadāya na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṁ āpajjati, appamatto samāno ñāṇadassanaṁ ārādheti.
mn29:6.14_0: So tena ñāṇadassanena attamano hoti, no ca kho paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:6.15_0: So tena ñāṇadassanena na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn29:6.16_0: So tena ñāṇadassanena na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṁ āpajjati, appamatto samāno asamayavimokkhaṁ ārādheti.
mn29:6.17_0: Aṭṭhānametaṁ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṁ so bhikkhu tāya asamayavimuttiyā parihāyetha.
mn29:6.18_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṁ caramāno mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato sāraññeva chetvā ādāya pakkameyya ‘sāran’ti jānamāno.

mn29:6.20_0: ‘aññāsi vatāyaṁ bhavaṁ puriso sāraṁ, aññāsi phegguṁ, aññāsi tacaṁ, aññāsi papaṭikaṁ, aññāsi sākhāpalāsaṁ.

mn29:6.23_0: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco kulaputto saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito hoti:
mn29:6.24_0: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto,
mn29:6.25_0: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
mn29:6.26_0: So evaṁ pabbajito samāno lābhasakkārasilokaṁ abhinibbatteti.
mn29:6.27_0: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attamano hoti, na paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:6.28_0: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn29:6.29_0: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṁ āpajjati, appamatto samāno sīlasampadaṁ ārādheti.
mn29:6.30_0: So tāya sīlasampadāya attamano hoti, no ca kho paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:6.31_0: So tāya sīlasampadāya na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn29:6.32_0: So tāya sīlasampadāya na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṁ āpajjati, appamatto samāno samādhisampadaṁ ārādheti.
mn29:6.33_0: So tāya samādhisampadāya attamano hoti, no ca kho paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:6.34_0: So tāya samādhisampadāya na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn29:6.35_0: So tāya samādhisampadāya na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṁ āpajjati, appamatto samāno ñāṇadassanaṁ ārādheti.
mn29:6.36_0: So tena ñāṇadassanena attamano hoti, no ca kho paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:6.37_0: So tena ñāṇadassanena na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn29:6.38_0: So tena ñāṇadassanena na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṁ āpajjati, appamatto samāno asamayavimokkhaṁ ārādheti.
mn29:6.39_0: Aṭṭhānametaṁ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṁ so bhikkhu tāya asamayavimuttiyā parihāyetha.
mn29:7.1_0: Iti kho, bhikkhave, nayidaṁ brahmacariyaṁ lābhasakkārasilokānisaṁsaṁ, na sīlasampadānisaṁsaṁ, na samādhisampadānisaṁsaṁ, na ñāṇadassanānisaṁsaṁ.
mn29:7.2_0: Yā ca kho ayaṁ, bhikkhave, akuppā cetovimutti—
mn29:7.3_0: etadatthamidaṁ, bhikkhave, brahmacariyaṁ, etaṁ sāraṁ etaṁ pariyosānan”ti.
mn29:7.5_0: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
